ingredients: 1 cup milk, 1  ripe avocado, halved and pitted,   +   1/2 cup vanilla yogurt, 3 tablespoons honey, 8  ice cubes
nutrition: Total Fat 18g 23%, Saturated Fat 4g 21%, Cholesterol 13mg 4%, Sodium 101mg 4%, Total Carbohydrate 49g 18%, Dietary Fiber 7g 24%, Total Sugars 41g, Protein 9g, Vitamin C 11mg 55%, Calcium 264mg 20%, Iron 1mg 4%, Potassium 822mg 17%
